name: Sell The Deal
overview:
Lets face it; we love getting a great deal on products and services. And we love to try different things. So naturally we love what the daily deal guys like Groupon and LivingSocial have to offer. And when a great deal hits our inboxes each day, we buy. We buy deals collectively. We buy deals impulsively. We have every intention of using that voucher from Groupon that magically appears in our inbox minutes after a deal is completed.

But sometimes, despite our best efforts, some of those vouchers never get used. Sometimes we just can’t find the time. But what about those great deals vouchers? Will they just expire without being used? Not anymore. Welcome to SellTheDeal.Lets face it; we love getting a great deal on products and services. And we love to try different things. We buy deals impulsively.

But sometimes, despite our best efforts, some of those vouchers never get used. Sometimes we just can’t find the time. But what about those great deals vouchers? Will they just expire without being used? Not anymore. Welcome to SellTheDeal.
